seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI text summarization and why is it useful?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI text summarization** is an advanced **natural language processing** technique that uses **artificial intelligence** to automatically create **concise summaries** of longer texts. This technology identifies **key information**, **main ideas**, and **important details** while eliminating **redundancy** and **less relevant content**. AI summarization helps users **quickly understand** lengthy documents, research papers, articles, and reports by extracting the **most essential information** in a **digestible format**. This saves **time, improves comprehension**, and enables **efficient information processing** in professional and academic contexts. Learn more about [automatic summarization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automatic_summarization) and [natural language processing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_language_processing).
seo.howToTitle: How to use the AI Text Summarizer tool?
howToSteps: **Paste or type your text** in the input area (supports documents, articles, reports)
**Choose summary type**: Short (3-5 lines), Medium (1 paragraph), Long (several paragraphs), or Key points
**Copy the result** using the copy button for your use
seo.useCasesTitle: Common use cases for AI text summarization
useCases: **Research efficiency** - quickly understand long research papers and academic articles
**News consumption** - get key information from lengthy news articles and reports
**Business meetings** - summarize meeting minutes and action items
**Legal document review** - extract key points from contracts and legal texts
**Content creation** - analyze competitors' content and industry reports

faq.question: How accurate are AI-generated summaries?
faq.answer: AI summaries are generally **very good** at capturing **main ideas and key points**. However, they may **miss nuanced context** or **subtle details** that human readers might consider important. Always **review summaries** for **critical information** and use them as a **starting point** rather than complete replacements for reading the full text.

faq.question: What types of text work best for summarization?
faq.answer: AI summarization works best with **well-structured text** like **news articles, research abstracts, business reports, and formal documents**. It struggles with **creative writing, poetry, highly technical jargon**, and **texts with complex logical relationships**.

faq.question: Is this summarization tool safe and private?
faq.answer: Yes! Your text is processed **100% securely** through your own **Google Gemini API key**. Nothing is stored on our servers, ensuring **complete privacy** of your documents and content. All processing happens **directly between your browser and Google's AI service**.
